Text:
A-8
V-8
Thanks Anonymous.
The 2012 American "Argo" is not a remake. It's about the 1979 Iran hostage crisis. Ben Affleck directs.
This Hungarian 2004 "Argo" looks what might result if Guy Ritchie directed" National Treasure" on a shoestring budget. Still it's entertaining enough, I suppose, if you make those allowances.

Anybody know how to sew the two parts together without putting the subtitles out of sync. I already tried Mkvmerge, no go.
